Miami_Beach.Half Moon (shipwreck): The Half Moon (also known as the Germania and Exen) is a racing sailboat which sank in 1930 near Miami, Florida, United States. It is located outside Bear Cut off Key Biscayne. Originally christened Germania, the racing yacht featuring a chrome-nickel steel hull was built by Krupp-Germania-Werft in 1908 in Kiel, Germany.
